author: aditya
msg: -- allow packaging of thrift as an rpm
- also allows development as a non-root user

author: dreiss
msg: Allow docstrings at the top of the program.
Generated C++ is identical to installed thrift.

author: dreiss
msg: The old docstring syntax collided with the syntax for list constants.
The new syntax looks a lot like doxygent comments.
Generated C++ is identical to installed thrift.

author: mcslee
msg: Fix Thrift compiler to support reuse of enums and constants in later constants
Summary: So for example, you can make a constant map of enum values to string identifiers.
Test Plan: ConstantsDemo.thrift in the test folder
